Text.Page:
This is a simple, albeit dirty, job.

Sweep the Contaminated Field clear of {@LinkCreature:40#3#enraged armored piglings}, {@LinkCreature:40#11#selvaras scouts} and {@LinkCreature:40#12#assassins}, {@LinkCreature:40#17#mutagenic wolves}, {@LinkCreature:40#18#violent mycanars}, and {@LinkCreature:40#29#brutal sabertooths}. Collect samples for further study.

Find Glasrinne in Frontera when you're finished.
Too many of our enemies are still too close for comfort. But keep going.
I can learn a lot from those contaminated samples. Have you got them all?
